lead_paragraph: The Homeland Security Department on Thursday formally began sharing details of new digital threats with private business and other government agencies, a culmination of a longtime effort to improve cybersecurity.

headline.main: Homeland Security Begins Sharing Cyberthreats With Business
headline.print_headline: Homeland Security Begins Sharing Cyberthreats With Business

snippet: The Homeland Security Department on Thursday formally began sharing details of new digital threats with private business and other government agencies, a culmination of a longtime effort to improve cybersecurity.
